trans-unit.source: Represents the information needed by an event handler to perform custom processing whenever the contents of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: 代表事件處理常式執行自訂處理時所需的資訊內容<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>變更。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The index of the change within the subject <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 主題內變更的索引<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 強型別<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>型別的<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>包含每個已移除<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>產生事件。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"> </xref>對應到事件。
